title: Playboy Video Centerfold: Corinna Harney - Playmate of the Year 1992
overview: Take a gamble on Las Vegas lovely Corinna Harney, Playboy’s 1992 Playmate of the Year. It’s easy to see why she’s known as “Lady Luck” and now,  lucky you–you’ll venture beyond Corinna’s provocative pictorial and watch her come to life in action-filled scenes and stunning nude sessions that sizzle.  In this sensational showcase, Corinna takes you on a fun-filled tour of her hometown.  From the glitz and glamour of Las Vegas’ famed boulevards, to luxuriating in sensual sand dunes and the warm Nevada sun, to an erotic journey in the Valley of Fire for the sexiest mirage ever, this desert flower is in full bloom. Then she’ll take you into her private world for a luxurious look at life’s simple pleasures. And, let your inhibitions run wild with her in an unforgettable bedroom fantasy that shows you why she took this year’s top honors.  Hit the jackpot with Corinna–she’s a sure bet!
